name: Making the Things That Help Others Do Their Thing
description: In this session, Joey will share how anyone can begin creating for others and will break down some of the most intimidating barriers we can often place on ourselves when just getting started. For the past four years, he’s created dozens of Figma Community resources for designers in the industry to use in projects and work of their own. Now at Twitter, his time is spent helping to create components for the broader team to use. He’ll share his perspective on the challenges, rewarding parallels, and differences between these experiences.
